## What is Quarto?

![](./pics/quarto.png){width=20%}(å”¸"é—Šæ‹“") is an open-source (MIT license) scientific and technical publishing system built on [Pandoc](https://pandoc.org/) via extended markdown format (***.qmd***) files. It allows you to create dynamic documents, reports, presentations, and websites using a single authoring framework. Quarto supports multiple programming languages, including R, Python, and Julia, making it a versatile tool for data analysis and visualization.


* Official website: [quarto.org](https://quarto.org/)

* Github repo: [github.com/quarto-dev/](https://github.com/quarto-dev/)

[![](./pics/qmd-how-it-works.png)](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/hello/text-editor.html#rendering)
